targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
  anomaly_type,
  anomaly_level,
  anomaly_details,
  anomaly_count,
  detect_time
FROM (
  SELECT 
    'Gov_App_Anomaly' as anomaly_type,
    CASE 
      WHEN countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code != '200') > 100 THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code != '200') > 50 THEN 'High'
      WHEN countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code != '200') > 10 THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Normal'
    END as anomaly_level,
    concat('Gov app errors: ', toString(countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code != '200'))) as anomaly_details,
    countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code != '200') as anomaly_count,
    now() as detect_time
  FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    'Slow_Request_Anomaly' as anomaly_type,
    CASE 
      WHEN countIf(total_request_duration > 5000) > 1000 THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN countIf(total_request_duration > 3000) > 500 THEN 'High'
      WHEN countIf(total_request_duration > 2000) > 200 THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Normal'
    END as anomaly_level,
    concat('Slow requests: ', toString(countIf(total_request_duration > 3000))) as anomaly_details,
    countIf(total_request_duration > 3000) as anomaly_count,
    now() as detect_time
  FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
  
  UNION ALL
  
  SELECT 
    'Error_Rate_Anomaly' as anomaly_type,
    CASE 
      WHEN countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/nullIf(count(), 0) > 10 THEN 'Critical'
      WHEN countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/nullIf(count(), 0) > 5 THEN 'High'
      WHEN countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/nullIf(count(), 0) > 2 THEN 'Medium'
      ELSE 'Normal'
    END as anomaly_level,
    concat('Error rate: ', toString(round(countIf(response_status_code != '200')*100.0/nullIf(count(), 0), 2)), '%') as anomaly_details,
    countIf(response_status_code != '200') as anomaly_count,
    now() as detect_time
  FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
  WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)
) 
ORDER BY 
  CASE anomaly_level 
    WHEN 'Critical' THEN 4 
    WHEN 'High' THEN 3 
    WHEN 'Medium' THEN 2 
    ELSE 1 
  END DESC

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
  AND request_uri LIKE '%gov%'

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
  AND (platform IN ('Android', 'iOS') OR device_type = 'mobile')

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
  AND is_bot = true

SELECT count(*) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
  AND total_request_duration > 3000

SELECT round(avg(total_request_duration), 2) as value
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code)

SELECT 
  toStartOfInterval(log_time, INTERVAL 5 MINUTE) as time,
  countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%') as gov_visits,
  countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code = '200') as gov_success,
  if(countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%') = 0, 0, countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%' AND response_status_code = '200')*100.0/countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%')) as success_rate
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
GROUP BY time 
HAVING countIf(request_uri LIKE '%gov%') > 0
ORDER BY time

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%Googlebot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%googlebot%' THEN 'GoogleBot'
    WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%bingbot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%Bingbot%' THEN 'BingBot'
    WHEN user_agent_string LIKE '%bot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%Bot%' OR user_agent_string LIKE '%crawler%' THEN 'Other_Bot'
    ELSE 'Normal_User'
  END as visitor_type,
  count() as request_count,
  countIf(response_status_code = '200')*100.0/nullIf(count(), 0) as quality_score
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
GROUP BY visitor_type 
ORDER BY request_count DESC

SELECT 
  platform,
  count() as requests,
  round(avg(total_request_duration),2) as avg_response_time,
  countIf(is_bot = true) as bot_count,
  round(countIf(response_status_code != '200') * 100.0 / count(), 2) as error_rate_pct
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
  AND platform != '' 
GROUP BY platform 
ORDER BY count() DESC 
LIMIT 10

SELECT 
  client_ip,
  count() as requests,
  countIf(response_status_code != '200') as errors,
  countIf(is_bot = true) as bot_requests
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
GROUP BY client_ip 
HAVING count() > 100 
ORDER BY count() DESC 
LIMIT 15

SELECT 
  CASE 
    WHEN length(request_uri) < 50 THEN 'Simple-API'
    WHEN length(request_uri) < 100 THEN 'Medium-API'
    ELSE 'Complex-API'
  END as api_complexity,
  count() as requests,
  round(avg(total_request_duration),2) as avg_response_time,
  round(quantile(0.95)(total_request_duration),2) as p95_response_time,
  countIf(total_request_duration > 3000) as slow_requests
FROM nginx_analytics.dwd_nginx_enriched_v3 
WHERE $__timeFilter(log_time)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_unit IN (${business_unit:singlequote}), $business_unit)
    AND $__conditionalAll(environment IN (${environment:singlequote}), $environment)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_domain IN (${business_domain:singlequote}), $business_domain)
    AND $__conditionalAll(business_criticality IN (${business_criticality:singlequote}), $business_criticality)
    AND $__conditionalAll(platform_type IN (${platform_type:singlequote}), $platform_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(device_type IN (${device_type:singlequote}), $device_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(api_name IN (${api_name:singlequote}), $api_name)
    AND $__conditionalAll(os_type IN (${os_type:singlequote}), $os_type)
    AND $__conditionalAll(response_status_code IN (${status_code:singlequote}), $status_code) 
GROUP BY api_complexity 
ORDER BY count() DESC
